## SubscriptionStatus type

Possible states a subscription can be in.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SubscriptionStatus = "active" | "canceled" | "incomplete" | "incomplete_expired" | "past_due" | "trialing" | "unpaid";
```
